features: ☑ MargGona all-in-one features cushion: Non-slip rubber bottom, machine-washable zippered cover for easy cleaning. Premium quality durable high-Density memory foam for superior comfort

☑ Most Comfortable cushion: The U-shaped design, with its cut-out center, while reducing pressure on the coccyx/tailbone and promotes healthy posture thereby, alleviating any discomfort caused by sitting for extended periods.

☑ Versatile and Durable For Use: Office chair cushions, drivers' car seat cushions, car passenger, lorry driver, airplane, buses and trains, wheelchairs, hard kitchen/dining room chairs, football matches, and other sporting events. Suitable for any hard surface.

☑ Heat Responsive Technology: The advanced seat cushion for office chair responds to the heat of your body to mold perfectly to the shape of your bottom. The thick foam padding compresses and cushions enough to keep you supported while sitting for long periods. Soft yet firm

☑ Customer Service: The sciatica pillow for sitting is a mix of firmness and comfort. However, please allow yourself 1-2 weeks to adapt to a new feeling. Your satisfaction is our top priority. If you’re not satisfied, please let us know, We will serve you until you are satisfied

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Gel Enhanced Seat Cushion - Memory Foam Chair Pillow with Cooling Gel for Sciatica Coccyx Back & Tailbone Pain Relief - Office Chair Car Seat Cushion Back Pain? Are you sitting comfortably? The key to making sitting enjoyable again is to relieve pressure in the correct places. MargGona memory foam cooling seat cushion features a U-shaped design and a contoured surface. At the rear of the cushion, there is a small cut-out, which leaves the coccyx, more commonly known as the tailbone, hovering over the sitting surface. This, in turn, eliminates any pressure from the surrounding areas. Layered over the memory foam is a padded sheet of cooling gel. This added feature helps keep users cool throughout the day in summer and adds an extra layer of comfort and cushion. The well-ventilated, mesh cover allows proper airflow so that users can benefit from this cooling feature all day.
Highly recommend it to the long-distance drivers and people who work in the office for over 6 hours a day.

A Fluid, Ergonomic Design seat cushion. Cooling gel memory foam seat cushion!! Comfortable & strong support& not easy to deformMemory foam could relieve sciatic nerve and lower back painHelps keep users cool throughout the day U-Sharp cut out design!! Tailbone pain is an increasingly common complaint among office workers. Our U-sharp seat pad eliminates that pain by removing all material under the coccyx, so you never put weight on your tailbone. Non-slip bottom design cushion. Non-slip bottom design keeps the cushion on the chairs The anti-slip bottom is made of soft silica gel, will not hurt your car seat surface.

Keep the cushion in the correct position. Our car seat cushion has an extendable strap so that we can tie the cushion firmly to any chair. You needn’t adjust your cushion again and again anymore like other brands. Removable and washable outer cover Breathable Polyester meshes fabric outer cover.The cover is washable.The memory foam can not be washed. Improving the driving vision of the driver. Add Comfort to those driving for more than 4 hours every day.Design for short people who want a good vision when driving.Add cooling on the PU chairs in hot summer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great for sitting. I enjoy it especially with the cooling feature.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: A family member had full hip replacement surgery and needed an extra cushion for her recliner (since that's what she sleeps in). We thought the gel cooling comfort would be helpful and we were 100% right. It took some getting used to but now it is her go to nighttime pillow. It also withholds weight for a long period of time without getting flat. 10/10 would recommend this pillow.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Car seat cushion
reviews.reviewText: I bought this cushion because I lost support in my drivers car seat. It made me sit too low. This cushion is a nice size, but I wish it was a little firmer so as not to compress as much.
Le coussin super et un très bon prix

reviews.reviewText: Had minor op on lower back which restricted how I sat, this cushion is amazing, cooling and very much the biz

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 23, 2022
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I like this cushion but haven’t found anything cooling about it as per the description. It’s very comfy on the buttocks though!The cushion came in a cylindrical bag and it was amazing to see it regaining its shape one removed from the bag. Not sure how easy it would be to get it back into its bag though!The quality of the memory foam is good and it acts how you would expect it to. Springs back to its shape once not sat on which is great as I’ve had some so called described “memory foam”cushions and pillows that are just foam so do not act in the way one expects memory foam to act!I’m currently using it on my office chair which has a back support as well as I suffer from chronic back pain. I do note that although very comfy once sat on it it did not stay insitu given the style of my chair which’s faux leather seat and has an opening between the seat and the back support. It therefore keeps slipping to the rear of my seat so I have to hold my chairs handles which also has wheels before sitting down.I also use it for when I have to go to meetings in our meeting rooms which have very hard uncomfortable chairs and the memory foam really makes a difference as to how long I can sit down before my back starts aching.The cushion is very well made and would be suitable for cars, hard seats, and with the straps I would hang it on the handles of my suitcase when I go on holiday for those darned hard chairs at the airport.Wish it had been around when I had my surgery. Would have made sitting down post surgery which was very painful a lot more easier.I can only imagine how long it will last given how well it is put together.Very comfy and I’d definitely recommend it.I hope you found this review helpful
Great size to use on hip after hip replacement surgery. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 14, 2023
